---

###[choco://utorrent](choco://utorrent)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

	
![Screenshot of uTorrent](https://remote.utorrent.com/static/images/win_ut_toolbar.png)	

##The #1 torrent download client on desktops worldwide.

###Why It's Awesome

####Lightweight
µTorrent is a little over 1 MB (smaller than a digital photo!). It installs ultra-fast and will never hog your valuable system resources.

####Powerful
Want total control? uTorrent offers advanced settings such as automation, scripting, remote management and more.

####Fast
Download your files as quickly and efficiently as possible without slowing down your other online activities.

####Bundles
Direct access to a over 10,000 artists and 2,000,000 pieces of content. Download media directly from a variety of artists, bands, authors and filmmakers.

**SOCIAL MEDIA:**
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/utorrent/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/utorrent) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/utorrent/) | [Blog](http://blog.utorrent.com/)

[uTorrent Remote Instructions](https://remote.utorrent.com/signup)

**REMOTE PROGRAMS OF NOTE:**
[Android µTorrent® Remote Client](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.utorrent.web) | [uTorrent Link Sender for Chrome](https://chocolatey.org/packages/utorrent-link-sender-chrome) | [uTorrent easy client for Chrome](https://chocolatey.org/packages/utorrent-easy-client-chrome)

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/utorrent/readme.md)**
